items.title: Monochrome Linen Set
items.description: Breathable linen top and shorts in soft tones.
items.longDescription: A relaxed matching set that pairs well with sandals or clean sneakers. Add a straw hat to complete the look.

items.title: Structured Blazer
items.description: Crisp blazer over a simple tee and denim.
items.longDescription: A versatile staple that sharpens any outfit. Try pastel colors for a seasonal pop.

items.title: Chunky Loafers
items.description: A bold yet wearable shoe for daily outfits.
items.longDescription: Works with cropped trousers or midi skirts. Add socks for a preppy twist.

items.title: Tailored Trousers
items.description: High-rise trousers with a clean front.
items.longDescription: Dress up with heels or down with sneakers. Choose neutrals for maximum flexibility.

items.title: Minimal White Sneakers
items.description: Timeless sneakers that go with everything.
items.longDescription: Keep them clean for a crisp look; pair with jeans, dresses, or trousers.

items.title: Denim Midi Skirt
items.longDescription: Looks great with tucked tees and lightweight knits.

items.title: Quilted Jacket
items.longDescription: Layer over hoodies or sweaters; olive and tan are easy to style.

items.title: Striped Knit
items.description: Classic stripes in a cozy knit.
items.longDescription: Elevates denim and boots combo. Go oversized for an effortless vibe.

items.title: Satin Slip Dress
items.longDescription: Layer with a blazer or cardigan; strappy sandals for events.

items.title: Utility Vest
items.longDescription: Great over tees or button-downs; balances wide-leg bottoms.

items.title: Wide-Leg Jeans
items.longDescription: Choose a full-length pair to skim the ground for a flattering line.

items.title: Chelsea Boots
items.longDescription: Works with trousers or dresses; treat leather to last longer.

items.title: Trench Coat
items.longDescription: Belt it for shape; khaki, black, or navy keep it timeless.

items.title: Cardigan Set
items.longDescription: Wear together or separately; pair with jeans or skirts.

items.title: Athleisure Dress
items.longDescription: Great for travel and weekends; add a cap and sneakers.
